GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles ordered by created_at by default

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing the article information matching the article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing the comments information matching the article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment linked the the article id and returns the newly created comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count on a specific article and returns the new article object
